name: IntendedVenue
title: Intended Venue
description: The Intended Venue code system defines codes used to distinguish measures that are developed with the intent to be used in a particular venue, establishing expectations for the types of data that will be available from systems in that environment.

concept.definition: An eligible hospital is an acute care facility that is eligible to participate in a quality measurement initiative.
An eligible clinician is a clinician who is eligible to participate in a quality measurement intiative.
